title.rendered: Top 5 Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace PHP Scripts on CodeCanyon

content.rendered:
Finding the right Laravel eCommerce script on CodeCanyon for your project isn’t easy. It takes time, hard work, and dedication – and yet a lot of developers fail to find the right script.

There are over 2900 PHP scripts on CodeCanyon alone.  Even if you filter your search to find the best Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace PHP Scripts the search results are almost 100! As a developer, you know time is money and you can’t go through each one of them to find the best one.

Well, if you’re scratching your head just know that you just clicked the accurate link to find the best multivendor eCommerce marketplace script.

And that’s not just it; we’ve done the hard work of reviewing through countless options to find the best multi vendor eCommerce marketplace solution from CodeCanyon so that you don’t have to. So sit back, relax, and let us guide you to the perfect solution to find the eCommerce marketplace for your client project. 

Without any delay, let’s get started!

Key Takeaways

  • Laravel multi-vendor scripts help you launch a marketplace quickly with less technical hassle.
  • These scripts come with ready-made features like vendor panels, order systems, and payment gateways.
  • Choosing the right script depends on your business needs, budget, and long-term plans.
  • MarketKing, FleetCart, and Yoori are three top Laravel marketplace scripts you can explore.

Table of Contents

  • Key Takeaways
  • What is A Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace?
  • What are Laravel Multi-Vendor eCommerce Marketplace PHP Scripts?
  • Is PHP Laravel Good for eCommerce?
  • Must-have Features of An Ideal Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace
  • Top 5 Best Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce PHP Scripts
  • Pricing and Review Comparison Table
  • How to Choose the Right Script for Your Marketplace? 
  • Common Mistakes to Avoid When Buying a Laravel Marketplace Script
  • Which One is The Best Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace PHP Script?
  • Final Words

What is A Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace?

A multivendor eCommerce marketplace is an online platform where many different sellers or vendors can sell their products or services. It’s like a virtual shopping center where you can find everything from clothes and groceries to electronics, all in one place. Popular examples include Amazon, eBay, and Etsy.

Instead of visiting many different websites to buy different things, people can find everything they need in one place using a multivendor eCommerce marketplace.

What are Laravel Multi-Vendor eCommerce Marketplace PHP Scripts?

Laravel multi vendor eCommerce marketplace PHP scripts are ready-made software tools built with Laravel (a PHP framework). They help you create an online marketplace where many sellers can list their products, manage orders, and get paid, just like Amazon or Etsy.

They are designed to save you time and money, as they come with most features already built. This means you can launch your online marketplace much faster than building it from scratch.

These multi vendor scripts use the Laravel framework, which is a strong and secure tool for building websites, meaning your marketplace will be reliable and can grow as your business does.

These scripts often include:

  • Admin panel to control everything
  • Vendor panel for sellers to manage products
  • Customer panel for buyers to shop easily
  • Secure payment options and commission settings
  • Mobile app compatibility and easy setup

Wondering why you should choose one? If you want to create a website where many people can sell things, and you want to use a reliable system like Laravel without complex coding, these PHP scripts are a great choice. They offer a good balance of features, security, and the ability to customize for your specific needs.

Is PHP Laravel Good for eCommerce?

The PHP web framework Laravel is considered one of the best for eCommerce marketplace development. It has many benefits, including: 

  • Highly Scalable
  • Secured
  • Eliminates The Need for Writing Redundant Code 
  • Clean, Maintainable Code Syntax
  • Comes with Prebuilt Libraries and Packages
  • Expressive Syntax for Clean and Maintainable Code
  • Flexible Content Management System                                                            
  • High-Performance Website 

Must-have Features of An Ideal Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace

Before choosing the script for your eCommerce Marketplace project from CodeCanyon, it’s important to have a clear idea about the features. Knowing the must-haves puts you ahead in terms of purchasing the right script and makes your eCommerce platform future-proof.

To make it easier for you, we have categorized the eCommerce solutions features into four groups: admin, customer, vendor, and deliveryman. This categorization will give you a comprehensive understanding of the script’s entire system.

Features for Admin

  • Data-Driven and Up-to-Date Dashboard 
  • Business Zone Management 
  • Necessary Web Panels and Mobile Apps 
  • Built-in POS System
  • Integration Option for 3rd Party APIs
  • Detailed Reports and Analytics
  • Promotion Management ( Ex: Campaign, Banner, and Coupons)
  • Store or Vendor Management 
  • Deliveryman Management
  • Multi Language and Multi Currency Setting
  • User Management
  • Product Management 

Features for Customers

  • Setting Location
  • Multiple Login System ( Ex: Manual, Social, Guest Login options)
  • Wishlist
  • Notifications for Real-Time Updates
  • Wallet & Loyalty Points
  • Live Order Tracking
  • Multiple Payment Methods
  • Multiple Languages
  • Search & Filtration

Features For Vendors or Sellers

  • Detailed Dashboard
  • Employee Management
  • Live Chat
  • Built in POS
  • Wallet
  • Product Management 

Features For Deliveryman

  • Self Registration
  • Multi Store Order Delivery
  • Delivery Dashboard
  • Order Request Notification
  • Online/Offline Status 
  • Password Recovery 
  • Order and Pricing Details
  • Change Order Status 
  • Contact Customer

Also Read: Top Multi Vendor Marketplace Platforms for eCommerce Project

Top 5 Best Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce PHP Scripts

“Can we skip to the good part?” – If this question pops out in your mind, then be assured that we are in the good part now. This section lists the top 5 Laravel multi-vendor eCommerce marketplace PHP scripts from CodeCanyon with details to build your next eCommerce project

1. MarketKing | Multi Vendor Marketplace Platform Code and Scripts

By 6amTech

Number of Sales: 3,100+

Reviews: 4.81
Link: MarketKing CodeCanyon 

MarketKing is a powerful Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace Script that enables businesses to operate with various business modules, unlimited vendors, and products all from a centralized platform. It is designed to meet the needs of various online businesses with multiple vendors. It is built using Laravel and Flutter frameworks to offer a modern & updated experience to all users including admin, vendor, deliveryman and customers.

MarketKing makes it simple to build a fully functional and professional-looking eCommerce marketplace. The script comes with a comprehensive package of 3 mobile applications (for store, deliveryman, and customer), 2 web panels (for admin and store), and 2 websites (Flutter and React). This all-in-one package makes it easier for businesses to manage their online marketplace effectively.

With MarketKing, users have the unique ability to launch multiple businesses simultaneously from a single platform. This innovative feature allows clients to onboard sellers/stores for a wide range of industries, including

-Grocery
-Pharmacy
-eCommerce Shops
-Online Food Delivery
-Parcel Delivery Services

They also launched a car rental module to take the platform to another level in terms of hassle-free rental experience for your customers. 

But that’s not all – the system also gives admins the freedom to add additional business modules as needed and a convenient option to switch modules on or off at any time.

Features: 

  • Multiple Business Module
  • Zone-wise Business Setup
  • Multiple Payment Gateways
  • Smart Report and Analytics 
  • Multilingual Support with RTL
  • Dynamic Product Management
  • Dispatch Management
  • Built-in POS for Admin and Seller
  • Wallet and Loyalty Points
  • 3rd Party API Settings
  • Landing Page Customization
  • Custom Coupon Setup
  • Promotion Management
  • User Management
  • Product Management
  • Dashboard with Statistics
  • Live Chat for Customers, Staff, and Admin

Pros: 

  • Multiple Zone Setup and Business Operation: Operate business in multiple zones with unlimited modules.
  • Zone Wise Banner Setup option for Promotion: Set banners based on different zones to promote business.
  • Customer-Specific Campaigns to Boost Sales: Launch campaigns specifically for particular customers to boost sales. 
  • Control Multiple Business in One Dashboard: Get all the data from multiple businesses into one dashboard as an admin. 
  • Guest Checkout Option for Customers: Offer Guest Checkout Option for Customers to Simplify The Ordering Process.
  • Customer Wallet and Loyalty Points for Retention: Provide a customer wallet and loyalty points system to reward their purchases and encourage them to keep coming back.
  • Light and Dark Mode: Give users the choice of light and dark mood for a personalized viewing experience. 
  • React Website Ensures Speed, Flexibility, and Performance: Users can enjoy fast, flexible, and high-performance browsing with a React website.
  • Clean Code and Detailed Documentation for Easy Installation: Clean code and detailed documentation provide easy installation and a smooth management option.
  • API Integration to Ensure System is Industry-Ready: Seamless API integration ensures compatibility and enhanced system functionality. 

Cons

  • React user website is an addon 

Price: $99

2. FleetCart – Laravel Ecommerce CMS

By EnvaySoft

Number of Sales: 2,772

Reviews: 4.60

FleetCart is a responsive and feature-packed eCommerce software that provides the multivendor marketplace script to run online businesses. It makes it easy to add products, manage inventory, and track orders.

Features:

  • Supports Multi Language and Multi Currency
  • Newsletter for Latest News and Updates
  • Supports RTL
  • Guest Checkout
  • Product SEO

Pros:

  • Powerful admin panel for easy business management
  • SEO optimized to give customers the best experience
  • Theme color customization option

Cons

  • Admin dashboard doesn’t include top-rated products, stores, selling items, deliverymen, or customers.
  • No module-based separate dashboard options 

Price: $59

3. YOORI | Multi Vendor Marketplace CMS

By Spagreen

Number of Sales: 803

Reviews: 4.31

Yoori is a single and multi vendor supported PWA marketplace CMS equipped with advanced features. It allows for rearranging and redesigning the homepage as needed. 

Features:

  • Multiple Language with RTL Supported
  • SEO Optimized
  • 8+ Payment Gateways with the Multi Vendor Addon
  • Multiple Currency Supported
  • Real-Time Status Update

Pros: 

  • Easy checkout with secure payment processing
  • Lifetime update
  • Faster loading speed

Cons: 

  • The user mobile app, web application, and delivery boy app would have to be bought separately 
  • OTP system is an addon 
  • The POS system is an addon

Price: $59

4. AmazCart – Laravel Multi Vendor E-commerce System


By CodeThemes

Number of Sales: 646

Reviews: 4.07

AmazCart offers both multi vendor and single vendor options in their Laravel eCommerce CMS system. For anyone wishing to build a versatile online store can check out this script.

 Features:

  • Can Sell Both Digital and Physical Products 
  • Category Wise Commission Setup
  • Custom SMS Gateway Integration
  • Multilingual and Multicurrency Supported 
  • Unlimited Categories and Sub Categories Page 

Pros:

  • Can include product videos
  • Role-wise permission setup 
  • Clean code with included documentation 

Cons:

  • POS and OTP system is an addon 
  • Can’t select and setup multiple zone from map 

Price: $149

5. Safecart – Multi Vendor Laravel eCommerce platform

By Byteseed

Number of Sales: 397

Reviews: 3.67

Safecart is designed using the Laravel framework for online marketplaces. It is suitable for both multivendor and single-vendor eCommerce platforms that offer scalability, performance, and a user-friendly experience. 

Features:

  • Option to Include Dashboard for Each Vendor
  • Can Set Individual Percentages or Fixed Commission Rate
  • Timely and Relevant Updated for All Users Through Notification 
  • Integrated Facebook and Google Login Options

Pros:

  • Blog module for boosting SEO and driving traffic
  • Capability to integrate third-party scripts
  • Drag & Drop – page, menu, form, and widget Builder 

Cons: 

  • Customer app, deliveryman app, and vendor app are separate add-ons. 
  • Doesn’t support multiple currencies

Price: $39

Pricing and Review Comparison Table

Before making the decision to purchase a script it’s crucial to know what other users are thinking. And the best way to know that is to look at the user reviews, just like we tend to go through movie reviews before watching it!

The table below gives you an idea of the different license prices and the genuine reviews of people from CodeCanyon who used the script firsthand-

How to Choose the Right Script for Your Marketplace? 

Now that you’ve got a detailed idea of the top Laravel multi-vendor scripts, let’s make your next step easier. I’m going to share a few simple tips that will help you choose the right one without the usual confusion or frustration.

Start with Business Goals

Think about what kind of marketplace you want to build. Are you focusing on digital products, physical items, local delivery, or a global setup? Your script should match those goals, not the other way around.

Check the Core Features

Make sure the script has the basics your business needs:

  • Vendor registration and dashboards
  • Product management
  • Order handling
  • Commission setup
  • Customer accounts etc

If any of these are missing or feel too limited, you’ll run into issues later.

Look for Scalability

You might start small, but if things go well, you’ll want to grow. Pick a script that can handle more vendors, more orders, and more customers as your marketplace expands.

Go Through the Demo

Always test the live demo (if available).

You can check for these criteria:

→ Is it smooth?

→ Is the dashboard easy to use?

→ Does it look modern and mobile-friendly?

…and many more. 

If it feels clunky now, it won’t magically improve later.

Review Support and Documentation

Good support saves you time. Check if the script has clear documentation, video tutorials, or a responsive support team.

See How Often It’s Updated

A regularly updated script means the developers are active. Look for recent updates, new features, and bug fixes. If it hasn’t been touched in a year, you’d better look for other up-to-date solutions. 

Read Real User Reviews

Other buyers can tell you what worked (and what didn’t). Scan the reviews, especially the ones with detailed feedback. They’ll often point out things you won’t see in the sales page.

Match It With Your Budget

Some scripts look great but come with hidden costs (like expensive add-ons).

Make sure the price fits your budget, and that you know what’s included from the start. Otherwise, in the long run, you and your project both would suffer. 

Check Customization Flexibility

Every business is different. So, you’ll likely need to tweak the design, workflows, or features. Look for scripts that are developer-friendly and offer clean, modular code. This makes future changes easier and faster, whether you’re doing it yourself or hiring someone.

Understand the Pricing Model

Some scripts charge a one-time fee. Others may have ongoing costs like license renewals, add-ons, or premium support. Take a close look at what’s included in the package and what might cost extra later. This way, you can plan your budget with fewer surprises.

Common Mistakes to Avoid When Buying a Laravel Marketplace Script

Below, I have listed a few common problems that many developers and businessmen make while choosing a Laravel marketplace script. To help you not repeat the same, I have listed the common ones – 

  • Not checking the demo properly
  • Choosing based on looks only
  • Overlooking support and documentation
  • Not checking for regular updates
  • Overlooking customization options
  • Skipping security checks
  • Ignoring compatibility 
  • Focusing only on price
  • Ignoring integration needs
  • Not planning for future growth
  • Picking a script that’s too complex for your needs

Which One is The Best Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce Marketplace PHP Script?

Now that you have an idea about the top 5 multi vendor eCommerce marketplace PHP scripts on CodeCanyon, you might be wondering which one is the best among them. Well, after extensive research based on code quality, documentation, features, pricing, customer support, and many other factors, we have found that MarketKing passes all the hard questions and brings the best multivendor eCommerce marketplace script. 

MarketKing comes with a clean and customizable code with advanced features like a multi-zone business setup, multi businesses within one platform,  react website, guest checkout options, multi-lingual & multi-currency support, and many more. You can get all of these features included in the script at a budget-friendly price. 

MarketKing stands out because: 

  • Multi Vendor, Multi Zone and Multi Module Feature All at One Platform
  • Various Earning Method for Admin
  • Integrated Parcel Delivery Solution 
  • Profitable Business Model
  • Clean and Maintainable Code
  • Dedicated Technical Support Team to Help with All The Queries 
  • Transparent and Cost Effective Pricing Model
  • Performance Optimized and Scalable Script
  • Mobile Responsive 
  • Robust Security Framework

Recommended Reading:

  • Easy Guide to Launch an eCommerce Website for Small Business
  • How to Make a Marketplace Website: An Easy Guide 
  • How To Build an Online Grocery Marketplace Solution With MarketKing

Final Words

We know among all the available Laravel Multi Vendor eCommerce PHP Scripts on CodeCanyon it’s hard to choose the right one. It will be wise to choose a script that comes with all the necessary features, modules, clean code, and documentation without breaking the bank like MarketKing.

Remember to prioritize your budget, needs, and requirements and go with an industry-ready solution. We hope this blog helps you choose from the top choices and make your multi vendor eCommerce marketplace development journey easy.

1. Are there any licensing restrictions associated with multi-vendor eCommerce scripts purchased from Codecanyon?

Yes, licensing restrictions are associated with multi-vendor eCommerce scripts purchased from Codecanyon. Codecanyon offers two types of licenses: the Regular License, which is for personal projects, and the Extended License, which is for an end product that’s sold. Depending on the script you purchase, the usage restrictions may differ. For more details on these licensing options, please read here.

2. What level of customization is typically possible with multi vendor eCommerce PHP scripts from CodeCanyon?

The customization level of multi vendor eCommerce PHP scripts from CodeCanyon depends on the chosen script and your customization needs. Each script offers different levels of flexibility for tailoring your marketplace to your needs.

3. What are some top Laravel multivendor eCommerce scripts?

Some popular Laravel multivendor eCommerce scripts include MarketKing, FleetCart, and Yoori.

4. Why should I choose a Laravel multi vendor marketplace script?

Laravel multi-vendor marketplace script helps you launch faster without building from scratch. They come with ready features like vendor dashboards, product uploads, order tracking, and more.
